alert.note: Alert for Allen (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 31 at 7:33PM CST until February 06 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Kinder Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Oakdale Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Oakdale. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding, mainly forested areas along the river will occur. Park and picnic ground off of Highway 10 begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.0 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Calcasieu River Oakdale 17.0 16.3 Tue 6 pm CST 16.1 16.0 16.4 &&
